course_description: This course examines the cyclical intersection of politics, education, and race in the history of public school education in Georgia from the Civil War to the present era, considering both the forms of systemic oppression as well as the continuity of community responses.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3788, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: C. Sanders, Status: Closed
